sentences.english: This is the website for International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 这是国际理论与应用化学联合会的网站。

sentences.english: GLO started the sponsorship of the Confederation of African Football African Player of the Year Award.
sentences.chinese: 格洛开始赞助的非洲足球联合会非洲年度最佳球员。

sentences.english: Lippi overlooks last summer's Confederations Cup, in which his team lost to Egypt and Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 里皮回想去在联合会杯上他的队伍输给埃及和巴西后。

sentences.english: AJ Duffy is president of the United Teachers Los Angeles union. Mr.
sentences.chinese: AJ达菲是美国洛杉矶教师联合会主席。

sentences.english: I have been elected best goalkeeper by the South America Foot-ball Federation in succession three years in a row.
sentences.chinese: 我连续三年被南美足球联合会推举为最佳守门员。

sentences.english: The International Volleyball Federation (FIVB) was formed in 1946.
sentences.chinese: 国际排球联合会成立于1946年。

sentences.english: Job security was the top issue for union members. The U. A.
sentences.chinese: 对联合会的成员而言，工作保障是最重要的。

sentences.english: Chongqing, a metropolis in the southwest of China, has set up an Anti-Cult Federation of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 中国西南的大都市重庆成立了重庆市反邪教联合会。

sentences.english: Most of the voters are lining up to support him in the election campaign.
sentences.chinese: 有几年，联合会对劳联表示敬重，以支持劳工运动。

sentences.english: Weifang is the hometown of kites as well as the headquarter of World Kite Federation.
sentences.chinese: 潍坊是风筝的故乡，是世界风筝联合会总部所在地。

sentences.english: 1949:All-China Women's Federation was established on April 3rd.
sentences.chinese: 1949年4月3日，中华全国民主妇女联合会成立。

sentences.english: FIP is a disease that is related to Corona virus.
sentences.chinese: 国际制药联合会是一种疾病，这是相关的冠状病毒。

sentences.english: Scaling up to water boards or user federations should be encouraged.
sentences.chinese: 同时鼓励扩大水委员会或用水户联合会。

sentences.english: The Amity Foundation and a farming association in Yongji, Shanxi Province, were named in the organization category.
sentences.chinese: 四川省永济的农业联合会和友好资金，被提名组织奖。

sentences.english: The Council of USCS is made up of one representative from each of these organizations.
sentences.chinese: 联合会理事会由上述组织各派一位代表组成。

sentences.english: But the retail federation said at the end of November that discounters had fewer shoppers this year.
sentences.chinese: 但零售联合会说，在十一月底的购物折扣少了今年。
